-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Use htmx in your lucid templates
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/MonadicSystems/lucid-htmx#readme</a>
@package lucid-htmx
@version 0.1.0.6

module Lucid.Htmx

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-boost/</a>
hxBoost_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-confirm/</a>
hxConfirm_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-encoding/</a>
hxEncoding_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-ext/</a>
hxExt_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-delete/</a>
hxDelete_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-disable/</a>
hxDisable_ :: Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-get/</a>
hxGet_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-headers/</a>
hxHeaders_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-history-elt/</a>
hxHistoryElt_ :: Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-include/</a>
hxInclude_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-indicator/</a>
hxIndicator_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-params/</a>
hxParams_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-patch/</a>
hxPatch_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-post/</a>
hxPost_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-preserve/</a>
hxPreserve_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-prompt/</a>
hxPrompt_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-push-url/</a>
hxPushUrl_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-put/</a>
hxPut_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-request/</a>
hxRequest_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-select/</a>
hxSelect_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-sse/</a>
hxSse_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-swap-oob/</a>
hxSwapOob_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-swap/</a>
hxSwap_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-target/</a>
hxTarget_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-trigger/</a>
hxTrigger_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-vals/</a>
hxVals_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | <a>https://htmx.org/attributes/hx-ws/</a>
hxWs_ :: Text -> Attribute

-- | Place in your <tt>head_</tt> tag to use htmx attributes in your lucid
--   template
useHtmx :: Monad m => HtmlT m ()

-- | Place in your template after <tt>useHtmx</tt>, but before where the
--   extension is used via <tt>hxExt_</tt>
useHtmxExtension :: Monad m => Text -> HtmlT m ()

-- | Choose the version of htmx to use using a 3-tuple representing
--   semantic versioning
useHtmxVersion :: Monad m => (Int, Int, Int) -> HtmlT m ()

-- | Choose the version of a htmx extension you want to use. Should only be
--   used when using <tt>useHtmxVersion</tt> and the semantic version
--   should be the same
useHtmxVersionExtension :: Monad m => (Int, Int, Int) -> Text -> HtmlT m ()

module Lucid.Htmx.Servant
hxDeleteSafe_ :: Link -> Attribute
hxGetSafe_ :: Link -> Attribute
hxPatchSafe_ :: Link -> Attribute
hxPostSafe_ :: Link -> Attribute
hxPushUrlSafe_ :: Either Bool Link -> Attribute
hxPutSafe_ :: Link -> Attribute
